content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in the rental price. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I am also looking to maximize my gains. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate. What is your starting price?

I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maria. As a landlord, I want to be sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. I am open to negotiating with you, but I am also looking to maximize my gains. I am starting with a rental price of €500 per month. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay €450 per month.

I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am looking for the lowest price possible.

I am a student.

I am from Bolivia.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your interest in the apartment. I understand that you are a student and looking for the lowest possible price. However, as a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. I am countering with a rental price of €480 per month. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine
